university_projects.title: A Convolutional Neural Network That Extracts Depth from Images
university_projects.description: University Honours Research Project that explored the use of a bio-inspired Convolutional Neural Network to extract depth from images. The project was completed in 2023 and was supervised by Luke Hallum

university_projects.title: Anthropromorphic Soft Robotics Hand
university_projects.description: University Biomechtronics Project that explored the design and development of a print in place robotics fingers.
